casebody.data:
Richmond

Jack W. Edwards v. Elizabeth Ann Edwards. January 18, 1971. Record No. 7262.

Present, Snead, C.J., I’Anson, Gordon, Harrison, Cochran and Harman, JJ.

Lowry J. Miller (James B. Miller and Gary W. Reese, on brief), for appellant. Ken McFarlane Smith (James W. Korman; Kinney, Smith ■& Bar-ham, on brief), for appellee.

Decree affirmed without opinion by equally divided Court.
